verses.translation: Indeed, We sent this [Qur’an] down on the Night of Decree[1].
How do you know what the Night of Decree is?

verses.arabic_text: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
verses.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

verses.arabic_text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
verses.translation: On that night the angels and the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] descend by their Lord’s permission with all decrees[2].
It is all peace[3] until the break of dawn.
